body:
> this specification adds the
>    status code 308, defining this missing variant (Section 3).

It seems Go [doesn't have a constant for 308](https://godoc.org/net/http#pkg-constants), and explicitly [does not consider it for redirects](https://godoc.org/net/http#Get). This led to [unexpected behaviour](https://twitter.com/JohnShaftFr/status/747535722559606784) for someone using a program implemented in Go.

I can't find a technical reason this is not supported; is it just a matter of making Go know about 308's?
